front.title: Mechanism for performing LSP-Ping over RSVP protection paths

abstract.t: This document describes methods for performing lsp ping over mplsrsvp-te protection paths, when the protection paths are not in use.Conventional LSP-Ping follows the same path as data traffic. In somecases, it might be useful to follow the data path of protection paths(detours and bypasses) to ensure that the those paths are fullyfunctional. This document describes enhancements to LSP-Ping toperform ping over such paths.
